modName: YEF - Cured Serana - Yellowish Eyes Fix
summary: A small mod made by me (WARmadillo) with the help of Navida1. It replaces Serana's vampire eyes with green/blueish eyes without any other tweaks.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Verdana]Welcome! And thanks for visiting my mod. Feel free to ask anything if something isn't clear to you, and be sure to have fun!
[size=5]
[/size][/font][/b][center][b][font=Verdana][size=5][u][/u][/size][/font][/b][/center][font=Verdana][size=5][u]Why YEF?[/u][/size][/font]
[size=3]After you cure Serana, she still has these glowing yellowish eyes.. This really bothered me, so I thought of making a fix! Also, there are too many mods on the nexus that fix it but add a lot of other things to Serana, this mod was made so that your Serana stays the same good 'ol Serana without any other change. A small mod made by me [/size][size=3](WARmadillo/Melvinson) with the help of Navida1.

[/size][size=5][u]What does YEF do?[/u][/size]
[size=3]YEF (Yellowish Eyes Fix) replaces Serana's vampire eyes with greenish/blueish eyes without any other tweaks to keep it as lore friendly as possible! [/size]
[size=5][u]
Are there any side effects?[/u][/size]
[size=3]It also replaces her eyes if you [/size][b]haven't[/b][size=3] cured her yet, so it's recommended to [/size][b]use after you cured Serana! [/b][size=3]Also, This mod seems to have some small problems when used in combination with AMAZING FOLLOWER TWEAKS (Eyes return back to the vampire ones, can be fixed with a reload)! If you know how to fix that permanently, feel free to contact me.[/size][/left]
[size=5][u]
What can I do to support this small mod?[/u][/size]
[size=3]Leave a comment and/or endorse if you like the mod! Also, post some pictures of your Serana in the images section. I'd love to see some of your outcomes! Also, share it with anyone who has the same problem! The more people can profit from it the better![/size]
[size=3]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[b]HOW TO INSTALL:[/b]
[size=3]> Install the latest version of the mod with Nexus Mod Manager[/size]
[size=3]> Wait for the download to finish (almost instantly tho)[/size]
[size=3]> Install the mod[/size]

[b]HOW TO UNINSTALL:[/b]
[size=3]> Go to your Nexus Mod Manager[/size]
[size=3]> Double click the installed YEF mod to uninstall[/size]

[size=3]This mod [/size][b]doesn't[/b][size=3] uses any script or whatsoever, it's just a simple replacement of Serana's eyes.[/size]
[size=3]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]


[size=3][img]http://i.imgur.com/2GPq8Up.png[/img][/size]
author: WARmadillo
